message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $10,000 is significantly below its value. I could consider $17,000.  This is a fair offer considering the product's worth.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with $17,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $14,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
